comments.comments_text: Sheffield Utd quickly take a corner kick with a short pass.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [TEAM] quickly take a corner kick with a short pass.

comments.comments_text: Sheffield Utd have a chance to score from a corner kick, but the ball is cleared by a defender.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [TEAM] have a chance to score from a corner kick, but the ball is cleared by a defender.

comments.comments_text: Arsenal take the corner, but their hopes of scoring a goal end with a nice clearance by the defence. The ball is out of play and the linesman points at the corner flag. Corner to Arsenal.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [TEAM] take the corner, but their hopes of scoring a goal end with a nice clearance by the defence. The ball is out of play and the linesman points at the corner flag. Corner to [TEAM].

comments.comments_text: The resulting corner from Nicolas Pepe (Arsenal) is cleared by the defence. It will be a corner kick for Arsenal.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The resulting corner from [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is cleared by the defence. It will be a corner kick for [TEAM].

comments.comments_text: The resulting corner from Nicolas Pepe (Arsenal) only finds one of the defenders, who heads it out of danger.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The resulting corner from [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) only finds one of the defenders, who heads it out of danger.

comments.comments_text: Oliver Norwood (Sheffield Utd) takes the corner, but the opposition's defence is ready and clears the ball to safety.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) takes the corner, but the opposition's defence is ready and clears the ball to safety.

comments.comments_text: John Fleck (Sheffield Utd) has tested the patience of referee Michael Dean and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) has tested the patience of referee [REFEREE] and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.

comments.comments_text: Oliver Norwood (Sheffield Utd) swings in a cross from the corner, but Bernd Leno reads it well and gathers the ball.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) swings in a cross from the corner, but [PLAYER] reads it well and gathers the ball.

comments.comments_text: Oliver Norwood (Sheffield Utd) takes the corner with a short pass.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) takes the corner with a short pass.

comments.comments_text: The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Sheffield Utd will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. [TEAM] will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.

comments.comments_text: GOAL - 1:0! The corner comes over and Jack O'Connell flicks on with his head to Lys Mousset (Sheffield Utd), who makes no mistake and fires the ball into the back of the net.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: GOAL - 1:0! The corner comes over and [PLAYER] flicks on with his head to [PLAYER] ([TEAM]), who makes no mistake and fires the ball into the back of the net.

comments.comments_text: Arsenal take a short corner kick.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [TEAM] take a short corner kick.

comments.comments_text: The referee shows the yellow card to Bukayo Saka (Arsenal).
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The referee shows the yellow card to [PLAYER] ([TEAM]).

comments.comments_text: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Jack O'Connell (Sheffield Utd) was quite harsh and Michael Dean didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) was quite harsh and [REFEREE] didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: Nicolas Pepe (Arsenal) sends a wonderful cross from the corner kick. However, the defence works perfectly to clear the ball and avert the threat.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) sends a wonderful cross from the corner kick. However, the defence works perfectly to clear the ball and avert the threat.

comments.comments_text: Nicolas Pepe (Arsenal) takes the corner but fails to find any of his teammates. The ball is easily cleared out of danger.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) takes the corner but fails to find any of his teammates. The ball is easily cleared out of danger.

comments.comments_text: Half-time substitution. Joseph Willock will not participate anymore and Daniel Ceballos (Arsenal) is coming on.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Half-time substitution. Joseph [PLAYER] will not participate anymore and Daniel [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is coming on.

comments.comments_text: Nicolas Pepe (Arsenal) takes the corner but only sends it into a huddle of the defenders and one of them makes a good clearance.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) takes the corner but only sends it into a huddle of the defenders and one of them makes a good clearance.

comments.comments_text: Arsenal failed to take advantage of the corner as the opposition's defence was alert and averted the threat.

comments.comments_text: Michael Dean shows a yellow card to David McGoldrick (Sheffield Utd) for his blatant foul.

comments.comments_text: The referee shows a yellow card to Sead Kolasinac (Arsenal). No wonder. A clear yellow for bad language.

comments.comments_text: Nothing comes of the resulting corner from Daniel Ceballos (Arsenal). The defence is alert and manages to cut it out.

comments.comments_text: The referee cannot ignore such behaviour. Calum Chambers (Arsenal) sees a yellow card and needs to watch himself for the rest of the game.
